divs: Sighting Details(Ellisville southwest of st. louis,mo).(date 9-5-2011)While relaxing in the backyard on the deck laying in lawn chair with my grandaughter sitting next to me enjoying the nice afternoon and watching humming birds at the feeder and looking into the sky with a few clouds I noticed a flying craft with(brilliant silver cylnder shaped with small hump) no wings moving very very slow from the south east to norhtwest direction just barely above thin clouds.....my grand daughter saw it too...as it went over a small cloud and the cloud drifted it never appeared again....as we watched it was as if it disappeared into the blue sky.....ha.she yelled for her dad to come out but he was to late and just dismissed the incident but did believe we saw something...from watching airplanes at that height in the past it was the size of a southwest airline plane..... about 5 minutes later the same place in the sky a huge crarft just appeared .....it was ten times larger than the smaller craft we observed earlier as it moved slowly from the northwest to the southeast for 2 minutes....wonder how somthing thay big with no wings or tail can stay in the sky moving that slow(I must assume the don't need aerodynamics but use another source of power to move)....then all of a sudden it just disappeared as if you would turn off a light..it was a brilliant sliver color....having served in the military I've seen flying craft from the b-1,b2 and b52 bomber... been in fighter planes and touched,walked around and looked into the cockpit of the infamous supersonic Blackbird and have seen aircraft carriers...that was not swamp gas,optical illusion or a weather ballon,or any know craft I've ever observed.......it was as large as an aircraft carrier....cylynder shaped,but had a slight hump on top --my grand daughter and I thought we were lucky to have witnessed the ufo event....she believes in them now....I always have since I saw one in 1957 as a teenager along with thousands of people across the city and as it went north of St.louis in the early morning on a saturday or Sunday when we were out on the school yard playing ball and it was silver and huge ,but never had mufon then.......the government stated the that it was mass halucination or possibly swamp gas (ha... no swamps north of st louis) well thats the end of my sighting...keep your eyes open and please report what you see as thats the only way to understand what happening out there..good luck.......
Summary: smaller craft flew into cloud but never came out as cloud drifted by as if it disappeared...then suddenly the larger craft just appeared of no where and flew southeast from the northwest then it just dissappeared before my eyes and witness too
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Ballwin
There were no other sightings in Ballwin on or around September 5th 2011
